patthana4.6:1.1: Akusalaṃ kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:2.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:4.1: Kusalaṃ nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:5.1: Akusalaṃ nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:6.1: Abyākataṃ nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.6:7.1: Kusalaṃ nokilesañca abyākataṃ nokilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.6:8.1: Akusalaṃ nokilesañca abyākataṃ nokilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:9.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ, avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
patthana4.6:10.1: Kusalo nokileso dhammo kusalassa nokilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:11.1: Abyākato nokileso dhammo abyākatassa nokilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:12.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana4.6:13.1: Kusalaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:14.1: Akusalaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:15.1: Abyākataṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.6:16.1: Kusalaṃ saṅkilesikañca abyākataṃ saṅkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.6:17.1: Akusalaṃ saṅkilesikañca abyākataṃ saṅkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.6:18.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:20.1: Kusalo saṅkilesiko dhammo akusalassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:21.1: Akusalo saṅkilesiko dhammo akusalassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:22.1: Abyākato saṅkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:23.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana4.6:24.1: Kusalaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.6:25.1: Abyākataṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:26.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:28.1: Kusalo asaṅkilesiko dhammo kusalassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.6:29.1: Abyākato asaṅkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.6:30.1: Abyākato asaṅkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato asaṅkilesiko dhammo kusalassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:31.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:33.1: Akusalaṃ saṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:34.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:36.1: Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭho ca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana4.6:37.1: Abyākataṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhañca abyākataṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (2)
patthana4.6:38.1: Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
patthana4.6:39.1: Abyākataṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:40.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:42.1: Kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo kusalassa asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:43.1: Abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo abyākatassa asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.6:44.1: Kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo kusalassa asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana4.6:45.1: Abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo abyākatassa asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:46.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:48.1: Akusalaṃ kilesasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkiliṭṭhadukasadisaṃ.)
patthana4.6:49.1: Akusalaṃ kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:52.1: Kusalaṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:53.1: Akusalaṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:54.1: Abyākataṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:55.1: Kusalaṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca abyākataṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.6:56.1: Akusalaṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca abyākataṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:57.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:59.1: Kusalo saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo kusalassa saṅkilesikassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:60.1: Abyākato saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo abyākatassa saṅkilesikassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:61.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana4.6:62.1: Akusalaṃ kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:63.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:65.1: Akusalaṃ saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:68.1: Akusalaṃ kilesañceva kilesasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:71.1: Akusalaṃ kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:74.1: Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko ca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana4.6:75.1: Abyākataṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.6:76.1: Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikañca abyākataṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:77.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:79.1: Kusalo kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo kusalassa kilesavippayuttassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.6:80.1: Abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa kilesavippayuttassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:81.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana4.6:82.1: Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:83.1: Abyākataṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.6:84.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… āsevane vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:86.1: Kusalo kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo kusalassa kilesavippayuttassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.6:87.1: Abyākato kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa kilesavippayuttassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.6:88.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
